name: df-cv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ccv, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wcel(cv(s1), cch)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cch, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))
comment: Define the covers relation (on the Hilbert lattice). Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68, whose notation we use. Ptak/Pulmannova's notation ` A <oH B ` is read " ` B ` covers ` A ` " or " ` A ` is covered by ` B ` " , and it means that ` B ` is larger than ` A ` and there is nothing in between. See ~ cvbr and ~ cvbr2 for membership relations. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
